body_html:
If you want to try using the new variables wrap your code around a variable_scope(..., use_resource=True) and use tf.get_variable() to create the variables. Bear in mind that I don't expect it at this point to be bug-free nor as performant in all use-cases as old variables but I'd appreciate any bugs you find.
…
On Tue, Feb 14, 2017 at 9:44 PM, Eric Martin ***@***.***> wrote: @alextp <https://github.com/alextp> Any progress on the new variables? I see Variable.read_value() has been introduced in 0.12 (or sometime before) — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. -- - Alex

body:
If you want to try using the new variables wrap your code around a
variable_scope(..., use_resource=True) and use tf.get_variable() to create
the variables. Bear in mind that I don't expect it at this point to be
bug-free nor as performant in all use-cases as old variables but I'd
appreciate any bugs you find.

On Tue, Feb 14, 2017 at 9:44 PM, Eric Martin <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> see Variable.read_value() has been introduced in 0.12 (or sometime before)
